Key.Original: This vehicle will despawn on server restart, unless manually claimed
Key.English: This vehicle will despawn on server restart, unless manually claimed

Key.Original: You have no funds in your wallet to deposit
Key.English: You have no funds in your wallet to deposit

Key.Original: The Crate is about to go up in Flames, Step Back!
Key.English: The Crate is about to go up in Flames, Step Back!

Key.Original: You have taken a Drink from the Water Source
Key.English: You have taken a Drink from the Water Source

Key.Original: You have Refilled your Empty Water bottle from the Water Source
Key.English: You have Refilled your Empty Water bottle from the Water Source

Key.Original: You aren't thirsty at the moment
Key.English: You aren't thirsty at the moment

Key.Original: You have grabbed a quick bite to eat from the Food Source
Key.English: You have grabbed a quick bite to eat from the Food Source

Key.Original: You have taken a %1 from the Food Source
Key.English: You have taken a %1 from the Food Source

Key.Original: You aren't hungry at the moment
Key.English: You aren't hungry at the moment

Key.Original: You cannot access Gear inside a Locked Vehicle
Key.English: You cannot access Gear inside a Locked Vehicle

Key.Original: You need a hose to syphon fuel
Key.English: You need a hose to syphon fuel.

Key.Original: You do not have an Empty Jerry Can to refill!
Key.English: You do not have an Empty Jerry Can to refill!

Key.Original: You cannot Hotwire a Vehicle without a Toolkit
Key.English: You cannot Hotwire a Vehicle without a Toolkit

Key.Original: You cannot Hotwire your own Vehicle
Key.English: You cannot Hotwire your own Vehicle

Key.Original: You broke your Toolkit trying to Hotwire the Vehicle!
Key.English: You broke your Toolkit trying to Hotwire the Vehicle!

Key.Original: You have successfully Hotwired the Vehicle!
Key.English: You have successfully Hotwired the Vehicle!

Key.Original: You have entered a Safe Zone
Key.English: You have entered a Safe Zone

Key.Original: You have left a Safe Zone
Key.English: You have left a Safe Zone

Key.Original: You are not in a Vehicle
Key.English: You are not in a Vehicle

Key.Original: You do not have enough Money for Repairs - Repairs will cost $%1
Key.English: You do not have enough Money for Repairs - Repairs will cost $%1

Key.Original: Repairs will cost $%1 - Drive away at any time to cancel
Key.English: Repairs will cost $%1 - Drive away at any time to cancel

Key.Original: The City of %1 at %2 Has been overrun by %3. Clear them out for a Reward!
Key.English: The City of %1 at %2 Has been overrun by %3. Clear them out for a Reward!

Key.Original: The City of %1 at %2 has been liberated, the %3 have been eliminated. Thanks for your Help!
Key.English: The City of %1 at %2 has been liberated, the %3 have been eliminated. Thanks for your Help!

Key.Original: !!!ALERT!!! %1 (GRID: %2) shelled again from neighbouring Taviana. Survivors are advised to leave the area immediately
Key.English: !!!ALERT!!! %1 (GRID: %2) shelled again from neighbouring Taviana. Survivors are advised to leave the area immediately

Key.Original: %1 are patrolling %2. Wipe them out for a reward
Key.English: %1 are patrolling %2. Wipe them out for a reward

Key.Original: The %1 patrol at %2 have been killed, great work.
Key.English: The %1 patrol at %2 have been killed, great work.

Key.Original: %1 have overrun the Red Cross Medical Camp at %2, They have stolen much needed Medical Supplies. Kill them for a reward.
Key.English: %1 have overrun the Red Cross Medical Camp at %2, They have stolen much needed Medical Supplies. Kill them for a reward.

Key.Original: The Medical Camp at %2 has been Secured, The %1 have been Routed.
Key.English: The Medical Camp at %2 has been Secured, The %1 have been Routed.

Key.Original: Heavily Armed %1 have Occupied the Tower Outpost at %2. Wipe them out for a Reward
Key.English: Heavily Armed %1 have Occupied the Tower Outpost at %2. Wipe them out for a Reward

Key.Original: Great Work! The %1 at Tower 7 %2 have been Defeated
Key.English: Great Work! The %1 at Tower 7 %2 have been Defeated

Key.Original: %1 are broadcasting degenerate propaganda from the Radio Tower at %2. Put an end to this madness!
Key.English: %1 are broadcasting degenerate propaganda from the Radio Tower at %2. Put an end to this madness!

Key.Original: The %1 have been killed, and their disgusting propaganda is no longer polluting our airwaves. Great Work!
Key.English: The %1 have been killed, and their disgusting propaganda is no longer polluting our airwaves. Great Work!

Key.Original: %1 have captured the Munitions Depot at %2. Wipe them out and secure the Weapons for yourself.
Key.English: %1 have captured the Munitions Depot at %2. Wipe them out and secure the Weapons for yourself.

Key.Original: The Munitions Depot at %2 is now clear of %1
Key.English: The Munitions Depot at %2 is now clear of %1

Key.Original: A small squad of %1 have shot down a Blackfoot carrying supplies at %2. Investigate the Crash
Key.English: A small squad of %1 have shot down a Blackfoot carrying supplies at %2. Investigate the Crash

Key.Original: The %1 who shot down the Blackfoot have been eliminated. The Wreckage at %2 is now secured.
Key.English: The %1 who shot down the Blackfoot have been eliminated. The Wreckage at %2 is now secured.

Key.Original: Heavily Armed %1 have Established a Forward Operating Base at %2. Prevent them from expanding their influence in the Region.
Key.English: Heavily Armed %1 have Established a Forward Operating Base at %2. Prevent them from expanding their influence in the Region.

Key.Original: The %1 at FOB DELTA %2 have been Killed. Chernarus thanks you for your service.
Key.English: The %1 at FOB DELTA %2 have been Killed. Chernarus thanks you for your service.

Key.Original: %1 Have captured the Military Outpost at %2. A Reward will be offered for eliminating the Threat
Key.English: %1 Have captured the Military Outpost at %2. A Reward will be offered for eliminating the Threat

Key.Original: The Outpost at %2 has been liberated, Help yourself to the Weapons
Key.English: The Outpost at %2 has been liberated, Help yourself to the Weapons

Key.Original: %1 have dug in at %2. Wipe them out and take their weapons
Key.English: %1 have dug in at %2. Wipe them out and take their weapons

Key.Original: The %1 at the Bellend Trench %2 have been defeated
Key.English: The %1 at the Bellend Trench %2 have been defeated

Key.Original: A squad of armed %1 have setup camp at %2, Steal their supplies
Key.English: A squad of armed %1 have setup camp at %2, Steal their supplies

Key.Original: The %1 have been routed, and their camp at %2 has been taken over
Key.English: The %1 have been routed, and their camp at %2 has been taken over

Key.Original: %1 have built a Military Outpost at %2. A reward will be offered to anyone who can drive them out.
Key.English: %1 have built a Military Outpost at %2. A reward will be offered to anyone who can drive them out.

Key.Original: Xerxes Outpost at %2 has been cleared of the Hostile %1
Key.English: Xerxes Outpost at %2 has been cleared of the Hostile %1

Key.Original: %1 have brought down a VTOL at %2. Secure the crash site
Key.English: %1 have brought down a VTOL at %2. Secure the crash site

Key.Original: The Crashed VTOL at %2 has been secured, and the %1 have been eliminated. Great Work
Key.English: The Crashed VTOL at %2 has been secured, and the %1 have been eliminated. Great Work

Key.Original: %1 are attempting to establish a foothold in the region, they have constructed an FOB at %2
Key.English: %1 are attempting to establish a foothold in the region, they have constructed an FOB at %2

Key.Original: Great work, the %1 at %2 have been wiped out.
Key.English: Great work, the %1 at %2 have been wiped out.

Key.Original: %1 have been trafficking cocaine and weapons out of a makeshift laboratory at %2
Key.English: %1 have been trafficking cocaine and weapons out of a makeshift laboratory at %2

Key.Original: Mission Success. The %1 and their drug lab at %2 have been eliminated
Key.English: Mission Success. The %1 and their drug lab at %2 have been eliminated

Key.Original: %1 have taken control of the Radar Dome at %2. Eliminate them for a reward.
Key.English: %1 have taken control of the Radar Dome at %2. Eliminate them for a reward.

Key.Original: The %1 at the Radar Dome %2 have been cleared out.
Key.English: The %1 at the Radar Dome %2 have been cleared out.

Key.Original: %1 are attempting to sabotage the powergrid. They were last spotted at the solar farm %2
Key.English: %1 are attempting to sabotage the powergrid. They were last spotted at the solar farm %2

Key.Original: The %1 sabotaging the powergrid at %2 have been stopped
Key.English: The %1 sabotaging the powergrid at %2 have been stopped

Key.Original: %1 have constructed a Weapons Research facility at %2. Eliminate the threat
Key.English: %1 have constructed a Weapons Research facility at %2. Eliminate the threat

Key.Original: The %1 Research Facility at %2 has been secured.
Key.English: The %1 Research Facility at %2 has been secured.

Key.Original: %1 are growing crops and trafficking weapons at %2 Wipe them out and take their loot
Key.English: %1 are growing crops and trafficking weapons at %2 Wipe them out and take their loot

Key.Original: The %1 at Plantation 420 %2 have been eliminated. Well done
Key.English: The %1 at Plantation 420 %2 have been eliminated. Well done

Key.Original: %1 have set up a Small Firebase at %2. Infiltrate the base and steal their weapons
Key.English: %1 have set up a Small Firebase at %2. Infiltrate the base and steal their weapons

Key.Original: Success, the %1 at Firebase Echo %2 have been cleared out.
Key.English: Success, the %1 at Firebase Echo %2 have been cleared out.

Key.Original: %1 are ransacking the Aldi at %2. Somebody stop them!
Key.English: %1 are ransacking the Aldi at %2. Somebody stop them!

Key.Original: Success, the %1 looting Aldi at %2 have been wiped out.
Key.English: Success, the %1 looting Aldi at %2 have been wiped out.

Key.Original: You cannot sell your %1 (%2) because it is not empty
Key.English: You cannot sell your %1 (%2) because it is not empty

Key.Original: Only show items which the player can afford
Key.English: Only show items which the player can afford
Key.German: Zeige nur Gegenstände, die sich der Spieler leisten kann
Key.Spanish: Mostrar solo objetos que pueda comprar

Key.Original: Only show items which are in stock
Key.English: Only show items which are in stock
Key.German: Zeige nur Gegenstände, die auf Lager sind

Key.Original: Only show items compatible with the player's equipped weapons
Key.English: Only show items compatible with the player's equipped weapons
Key.German: Zeige nur Gegenstände, die mit der ausgerüsteten Waffe des Spielers kompatibel sind
Key.Spanish: Mostrar solo objetos compatibles con armas equipadas

Key.Original: Only show items the player can sell
Key.English: Only show items the player can sell

Key.Spanish: Equipar el articulo al comprar (si es posible)
